tooltips.aiGenerate: Click to generate an AI background based on your template and color choices. The AI will create a unique design that complements your text.
tooltips.templateGuides: Toggle field guides to see where your text will be placed. Use this when uploading or generating backgrounds to ensure text readability.
tooltips.safeZone: The safe zone ensures important content won't be cut off when printing. Keep text and logos within this area.
tooltips.bleed: Bleed area extends beyond the card edge to prevent white borders when trimmed. Background images should extend into this area.
tooltips.colorScheme: Choose a pre-designed color combination or create your own. The AI will use these colors as guidance for background generation.
tooltips.printResolution: Print resolution (300 DPI) creates larger files but ensures crisp output on professional printers.
tooltips.webResolution: Web resolution (72 DPI) creates smaller files optimized for digital sharing and screen display.

aiWorkflow.title: How AI Generation Works
aiWorkflow.content: Our AI creates unique backgrounds tailored specifically for business cards. It analyzes your chosen template, color scheme, and style preferences to generate professional artwork. The AI automatically preserves clear areas for your text and ensures the design maintains professional standards suitable for print.

printing.title: Printing Your Card
printing.content: For professional printing, export at 300 DPI (Print resolution). This creates a larger file but ensures crisp, high-quality output. Most print shops accept PNG or PDF format. The exported file includes proper bleed areas for edge-to-edge printing.

templates.title: Choosing a Template
templates.content: Templates determine where your text and logo appear on the card. 'Modern' offers a clean left-aligned layout. 'Classic' provides a traditional centered design. 'Minimal' emphasizes whitespace. 'Executive' conveys authority. Choose based on your industry and personal brand.

colors.title: Color Selection
colors.content: Choose colors that reflect your brand and ensure readability. Dark backgrounds work well with light text. For professional contexts, consider navy, charcoal, or deep green. Creative fields can use bolder colors. The AI will incorporate your color choices into generated backgrounds.
